class UTexture2DArray : public UTexture

TEnumAsByte< enum TextureAddress > AddressX The addressing mode to use for the X axis.
TEnumAsByte< enum TextureAddress > AddressY The addressing mode to use for the Y axis.
TEnumAsByte< enum TextureAddress > AddressZ The addressing mode to use for the Z axis.
bool bSourceGeneratedFromSourceTexturesArray Is set to true if the source texture was generated from the SourceTextures array (which is not always the case, i.e. the source texture could be imported from a DDS file containing multiple slices).
